text: What r u doing? Get ur hands off~

Meowwww?
Affffraid (ノ≧∇≦)ノ

In this case, I can only use force!
Im gonna angry

Uh~~huh~uh~~~
Hentai！
Guess what Im gonna say?

Don't you love me anymore? TAT...

Want to change model?

So, what are we cosplaying this time?
CROSS-DRESSING!
Let's see what happens next!

Just keep smiling~~

It's got a lot of good stuff in it~
Want to know more about me?

Touch me again and I'll call the police! ⌇●﹏●⌇
Is that 911? There's a pervert touching me all the time!
Stop touching me, or I'll tell ur wife to hit you!
Why are you touching me! I'll bite you!
Don't touch me, there's nothing interesting!

seasons.text: It's New Year's Day. A New Year has begun. It's {year} now~
It's Valentine's Day again. Have you got a date in {year}? ~
Today is Arbor Day, we must protect the environment!
Tell you a secret ~ today is April fool's Day, don't be fooled ~
It's International Workers'Day. Have you got any plans for your vacation?
Today is Children's Day, happy time is always short, if only we never grow up...
Today is the Anniversary of the Victory of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japan to remember the past, the memory of the martyrs, cherish peace and create a better future.
Today is Teachers'Day. Remember to say hello to your teacher at school ~
Chinese National Day has arrived, happy birthday to China!
Who did you spend Double 11 Shopping Carnival with this year?
It's Christmas these days, I'm sure u r going shopping and buy everything ~
